shortDescription: ADR-176: DXF Viewer Mobile Responsive Refactoring — 4 Phases Complete
problem: Το DXF Viewer ήταν αποκλειστικά desktop-oriented: σταθερό sidebar 384px, toolbar flex-wrap χωρίς overflow, floating panels με absolute positioning, mouse-only drag. Σε mobile (375px) το UI βγαίνει εκτός οθόνης.
cause: Δεν είχε σχεδιαστεί responsive layout — όλα τα components είχαν fixed widths και mouse-only interactions.
solution: Υλοποίηση 4-phase responsive refactoring: Phase 1 (layout shell: sidebar drawer + compact toolbar + responsive hook), Phase 2 (touch gestures: pinch-zoom + touch pan + pointer events migration), Phase 3 (panel clamping + mobile tool config + long press), Phase 4 (ARIA roles + viewport meta + iOS safe areas). Desktop παραμένει αμετάβλητο.
testing: npx tsc --noEmit → 0 errors. Desktop path unchanged (all changes behind layoutMode conditions).
notes: Mobile = view + navigate only. Drawing/measure tools disabled σε mobile λόγω precision requirements. 9 νέα αρχεία, 15 τροποποιημένα, 1245 lines added.

commits.message: feat(ADR-176): DXF Viewer mobile responsive refactoring — all 4 phases
